Articles.Content:
I launched a satellite into orbit now when I land my ship back at earth do I hit end flight or what do I do so that I can see my satellite in the tracking station?

Thanks

End flight will take your satellite out of orbit, essentially deleting the mission.

Use the Space Center to end your flight once it's parked in orbit.

This will be changed in a future update.

Edited June 11, 2013 by Phenom Anon X
typo
You can either hit end flight (Which will end your flight) or you can hit "Space Center" which won't end your flight, and then you can click on the tracking station.
